The best way to avoid this embarrassing situation would be swapping the clauses around. For example
"Although I don't have a girlfriend, my long-term male friend is treating me like my girlfriend" can be rewritten as
"My long-term male friend is treating me like my girlfriend although I don't have a girlfriend "
That way you can be assured of not putting "but" on the clause by mistake.

replies.msg: 唔會並用

你寫三個SVO，就可以一句入面用晒兩個although+but。
因為SVO嘅數量 要等同 fullstop + conjunction嘅數量。
conjuction：and, but, if, while, which, that... etc.
-------------------
#詳細解釋
要明although同but點可以一齊用，首先要明以下IQ題（唔明嘅可以skip：直接睇例子）：
1 sentence = 1 SVO + 1 full stop
2 sentence = 2 SVO + 2 full stop
n sentence = n SVO + n full stop
1 sentence = 2 SVO + 1 full stop + 1 conjuction
1 sentence = 3 SVO + 1 full stop + 2 conjunction
1 sentence = 4 SVO + 1 full stop + 3 conjunction
1 sentence = n SVO + 1 full stop + n-1 conjunction
(PS：SVO 泛指一個有tense verb嘅clause)
#例子
I love Goling.
(1 SVO + 1 full stop)
I love Goling. I also love Sum Wingbb.
(2 SVO + 2 full stop)
I love Goling, but I also love Sum Wingbb.
(2 SVO + 1 full stop + 1 conjuction)
Although I love Goling, I have Mayanne, but I also love Sum Wingbb.
(3 SVO + 1 full stop + 2 conjunction)
